comments:
I upgraded to the latest Mustang snapshot, v79, two days ago, and actually, the problems have been very few.  Now, however, any search operation -- find references, find declaration gives solid.consistent popup stating:

"A virtual machine error has occured. You are recommended to exit the workbench. Subsequent errors may happen and terminate the workbench without warning. See the .log file for details.

Log output follows.  A Google search indicates someone else reporting this behavior to Sun for the previous snapshot [v78] as well.  Sun told the reporting person to submit to IBM because it is in IBM code that the problem is manifested.  I don't see a bug opened by that person in this database.
